item.title: Missing Data News
item.description: On this page you will find news about missing data and applied biostatistical methods, referrals to other interesting blogs or articles. rmisstastic On this website you will find all kind of information on missing data. See also the news & links site. Calibration belt New paper in Stata journal about new method to assess the calibration of dichotomous outcome models with the calibration belt, including as author Stanley Lemeshow.
